verses.verse: וַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD פָּקַ֥ד <WH6485> pa-Kad visited אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> sa-Rah Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he אָמָ֑ר <WH559> 'a-Mar; as he had said וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as did יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD לְשָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> le-sa-Rah unto Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> dib-Ber. as he had spoken

וַתַּהַר֩ <WH2029> vat-ta-Har conceived וַתֵּ֨לֶד <WH3205> vat-Te-led and bare שָׂרָ֧ה <WH8283> sa-Rah For Sarah לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham Abraham בֵּ֖ן <WH1121> ben a son לִזְקֻנָ֑יו <WH2208> liz-ku-Nav; in his old age לַמּוֹעֵ֕ד <WH4150> lam-mo-'Ed at the set time אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- of which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber had spoken אֹת֖וֹ <WH854> o-To for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of which God

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- שֶׁם־ <WH8034> shem- the name בְּנ֧וֹ <WH1121> be-No of his son הַנּֽוֹלַד־ <WH3205> han-no-lad- that was born ל֛וֹ lo אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom יָלְדָה־ <WH3205> Yal-dah- bare לּ֥וֹ lo שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> sa-Rah unto him whom Sarah יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> yitz-Chak. to him Isaac

וַיָּ֤מָל <WH4135> vai-Ya-mol circumcised אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> be-No, his son בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old שְׁמֹנַ֖ת <WH8083> she-mo-Nat being eight יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; days כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. as God

וְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> ve-'av-ra-Ham And Abraham בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old מְאַ֣ת <WH3967> me-'At was an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years בְּהִוָּ֣לֶד <WH3205> be-hiv-Va-led was born ל֔וֹ lo, אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak Isaac בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. when his son

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer said שָׂרָ֔ה <WH8283> sa-Rah, And Sarah צְחֹ֕ק <WH6712> tze-Chok me to laugh עָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> 'A-sah hath made לִ֖י li אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; God כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- everyone הַשֹּׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> hash-sho-Me-a' [so that] all that hear יִֽצְחַק־ <WH6711> yitz-chak- will laugh לִֽי׃ Li.

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer, And she said מִ֤י <WH4310> mi Who מִלֵּל֙ <WH4448> mil-Lel Who would have said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham הֵינִ֥יקָה <WH3243> hei-Ni-kah suck בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> va-Nim should have given children שָׂרָ֑ה <WH8283> sa-Rah; that Sarah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יָלַ֥דְתִּי <WH3205> ya-Lad-ti ;for I have born בֵ֖ן <WH1121> ven [him] a son לִזְקֻנָֽיו׃ <WH2208> liz-ku-Nav. in his old age

וַיִּגְדַּ֥ל <WH1431> vai-yig-Dal grew הַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> hai-Ye-led And the child וַיִּגָּמַ֑ל <WH1580> vai-yig-ga-Mal; and was weaned וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as made אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham and Abraham מִשְׁתֶּ֣ה <WH4960> mish-Teh feast גָד֔וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, a great בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom the [same] day הִגָּמֵ֥ל <WH1580> hig-ga-Mel was weaned אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> yitz-Chak. that Isaac

וַתֵּ֨רֶא <WH7200> vat-Te-re saw שָׂרָ֜ה <WH8283> sa-Rah And Sarah אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הָגָ֧ר <WH1904> ha-Gar of Hagar הַמִּצְרִ֛ית <WH4713> ham-mitz-Rit the Egyptian אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom יָלְדָ֥ה <WH3205> Yal-dah which she had born לְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham מְצַחֵֽק׃ <WH6711> me-tza-Chek. mocking

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vat-To-mer Wherefore she said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham גָּרֵ֛שׁ <WH1644> ga-Resh Cast out הָאָמָ֥ה <WH519> ha-'a-Mah this bondwoman הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנָ֑הּ <WH1121> be-Nah; and her son כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not יִירַשׁ֙ <WH3423> yi-Rash shall not be heir בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- for the son הָאָמָ֣ה <WH519> ha-'a-Mah of this bondwoman הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> be-Ni with my son עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> yitz-Chak. [even] with Isaac

וַיֵּ֧רַע <WH7489> vai-Ye-ra' distressed הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> had-da-Var And the thing מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> me-'Od was very בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei sight אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham; in Abraham's עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al and אוֹדֹ֥ת <WH182> o-Dot because בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. of his son

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֗ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham, unto Abraham אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not יֵרַ֤ע <WH7489> ye-Ra' be distressed בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha in thy sight עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because הַנַּ֣עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar because of the lad וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- because אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> 'a-ma-Te-cha, and because of thy bondwoman כֹּל֩ <WH3605> kol all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after תֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> to-Mar hath said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> sa-Rah in all that Sarah שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> she-Ma' unto thee hearken בְּקֹלָ֑הּ <WH6963> be-ko-Lah; unto her voice כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for בְיִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> ve-yitz-Chak, for in Isaac יִקָּרֵ֥א <WH7121> yik-ka-Re be called לְךָ֖ le-Cha זָֽרַע׃ <WH2233> Za-ra'. shall thy seed

וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> ve-Gam also אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- And also of the son הָאָמָ֖ה <WH519> ha-'a-Mah of the bondwoman לְג֣וֹי <WH1471> le-Goy a nation אֲשִׂימֶ֑נּוּ <WH7760> 'a-si-Men-nu; will I make כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki because זַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> zar-'a-Cha because he [is] thy seed הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> Hu. he

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> vai-yash-Kem rose up early אַבְרָהָ֣ם׀ <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham בַּבֹּ֡קֶר <WH1242> bab-Bo-ker in the morning וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> vai-yik-kach- and took לֶחֶם֩ <WH3899> le-Chem bread וְחֵ֨מַת <WH2573> ve-Che-mat and a bottle מַ֜יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim of water וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and gave אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָ֠גָר <WH1904> Ha-gor [it] unto Hagar שָׂ֧ם <WH7760> sam putting עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שִׁכְמָ֛הּ <WH7926> shich-Mah [it] on her shoulder וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> hai-Ye-led and the child וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֶ֑הָ <WH7971> vay-shal-le-Che-ha; and sent her away וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> vat-Te-lech departed וַתֵּ֔תַע <WH8582> vat-Te-ta', and wandered בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <WH4057> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness בְּאֵ֥ר be-'Er שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> Sha-va'. of Beersheba

וַיִּכְל֥וּ <WH3615> vai-yich-Lu was spent הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim And the water מִן־ <WH4480> min- in הַחֵ֑מֶת <WH2573> ha-Che-met; the bottle וַתַּשְׁלֵ֣ךְ <WH7993> vat-tash-Lech and she cast אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיֶּ֔לֶד <WH3206> hai-Ye-led, the child תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under אַחַ֥ד <WH259> 'a-Chad under one הַשִּׂיחִֽם׃ <WH7880> has-si-Chim. of the shrubs

וַתֵּלֶךְ֩ <WH1980> vat-te-leCh went וַתֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> vat-Te-shev and sat her down לָ֜הּ lah מִנֶּ֗גֶד <WH5048> min-Ne-ged, over against הַרְחֵק֙ <WH7368> har-Chek [him] a good way off כִּמְטַחֲוֵ֣י <WH2909> kim-ta-cha-Vei shot קֶ֔שֶׁת <WH7198> Ke-shet, arch כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אָֽמְרָ֔ה <WH559> 'a-me-Rah, for she said אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not אֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> 'er-'Eh Let me not see בְּמ֣וֹת <WH4194> be-Mot the death הַיָּ֑לֶד <WH3206> hai-Ya-led; of the child וַתֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> vat-Te-shev And she sat מִנֶּ֔גֶד <WH5048> min-Ne-ged, him וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> vat-tis-Sa over against [him] and lift up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קֹלָ֖הּ <WH6963> ko-Lah her voice וַתֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <WH1058> vat-Te-vek. and wept

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' heard אֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice הַנַּעַר֒ <WH5288> han-na-'Ar of the lad וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach and the angel אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him of God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָגָר֙ <WH1904> ha-Gar to Hagar מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim, out of heaven וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said לָ֖הּ lah מַה־ <WH4100> mah- to her What לָּ֣ךְ lach הָגָ֑ר <WH1904> ha-Gar; to Hagar אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <WH3372> tir-'I, affright כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for שָׁמַ֧ע <WH8085> sha-Ma' hath heard אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> E-lo-Him not for God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar of the lad בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ba-'a-Sher after הוּא־ <WH1931> hu- he שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. in it

ק֚וּמִי <WH6965> Ku-mi Arise שְׂאִ֣י <WH5375> se-'I lift up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar, the lad וְהַחֲזִ֥יקִי <WH2388> ve-ha-cha-Zi-ki and hold אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדֵ֖ךְ <WH3027> ya-Dech him in thine hand בּ֑וֹ bo; כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> le-Goy nation גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol him a great אֲשִׂימֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH7760> 'a-si-Men-nu. for I will make

וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <WH6491> vai-yif-Kach opened אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵינֶ֔יהָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-ha, her eyes וַתֵּ֖רֶא <WH7200> vat-Te-re and she saw בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> be-'Er a well מָ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; of water וַתֵּ֜לֶךְ <WH1980> vat-Te-lech went וַתְּמַלֵּ֤א <WH4390> vat-te-mal-Le and filled אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֵ֙מֶת֙ <WH2573> ha-Che-met the bottle מַ֔יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, with water וַתַּ֖שְׁקְ <WH8248> vat-Tashk drink אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנָּֽעַר׃ <WH5288> han-Na-'ar. the lad

וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> vay-Hi and became אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> E-lo-Him And God אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- was with הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> han-Na-'ar was with the lad וַיִּגְדָּ֑ל <WH1431> vai-yig-Dal; and he grew וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar, in the wilderness וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> vay-Hi and became רֹבֶ֥ה <WH7235> ro-Veh abundance קַשָּֽׁת׃ <WH7199> kash-Shat. archer

וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> vai-Ye-shev And he dwelt בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness פָּארָ֑ן <WH6290> pa-Ran; of Paran וַתִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> vat-tik-kach- took ל֥וֹ lo אִמּ֛וֹ <WH517> im-Mo and his mother אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah him a wife מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> ba-'Et And it came to pass at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv, he וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer spake אֲבִימֶ֗לֶךְ <WH40> 'a-vi-Me-lech, that Abimelech וּפִיכֹל֙ <WH6369> u-fi-Chol and Phichol שַׂר־ <WH8269> sar- the chief captain צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> tze-va-'O, of his host אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God עִמְּךָ֔ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha, in בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> be-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> 'o-Seh. [is] with thee in all that thou doest

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, now הִשָּׁ֨בְעָה <WH7650> hish-Sha-ve-'ah Now therefore swear לִּ֤י li בֵֽאלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ve-lo-Him by God הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> Hen-nah, unto me here אִם־ <WH518> 'im- you will not תִּשְׁקֹ֣ר <WH8266> tish-Kor that thou wilt not deal falsely לִ֔י Li, וּלְנִינִ֖י <WH5209> u-le-ni-Ni with me nor with my son וּלְנֶכְדִּ֑י <WH5220> u-le-nech-Di; nor with my son's son כַּחֶ֜סֶד <WH2617> ka-Che-sed [but] according to the kindness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָשִׂ֤יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti that I have done עִמְּךָ֙ <WH5973> 'im-me-Cha you תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh unto thee thou shalt do עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> 'im-ma-Di, against וְעִם־ <WH5973> ve-'im- and to הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz unto me and to the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which גַּ֥רְתָּה <WH1481> Gar-tah wherein thou hast sojourned בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.
